org.transitime.db.structs

Class TripPattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.db.structs.TripPatternBase
      • org.transitime.db.structs.TripPattern
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Entity
public class TripPattern
extends TripPatternBase
implements java.io.Serializable
    A trip pattern, as obtained from stop_times.txt GTFS file. A trip pattern defines what stops are associated with a trip. Trip pattern reduces the amount of data needed to describe an agency since trips usually can share trip patterns.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • TripPattern

        public TripPattern(TripPatternBase tripPatternBase,
           Trip trip,
           GtfsData gtfsData)
        Create a TripPattern. Note: The name comes from the trip trip_headsign data. If not set then uses name of last stop for trip.
        Parameters:
        tripPatternBase - Already have the TripPatternBase info so pass that in. That way it doesn't need to be recreated from Trip.
        trip - For supplying additional info
        gtfsData - So can access stop data for determining extent of trip pattern.

      • toStringListingTripIds

        public java.lang.String toStringListingTripIds()
        A short version of the Trip string. Only includes the name and a list of the trip ids.
        Returns:

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Description copied from class: TripPatternBase
        Needed so can have Set/Map of TripPatterns and looking up elements will be quick and proper. Note that this method does not do a full hashcode on stopPaths. This is because the StopPath elements are not finalized when building up trip patterns. The tripPatternId still hasn't been set. So don't want to compare the entire StopPath objects. Instead, only use StopPath.basicHashCode(). This difference is very important so using an automatically generated method here would not suffice.
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class TripPatternBase

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Description copied from class: TripPatternBase
        Needed so can have Set/Map of TripPatterns and looking up elements will be quick and proper. Note that this method does not do a full equals() on stopPaths. This is because the StopPath elements are not finalized when building up trip patterns. The tripPatternId still hasn't been set. So don't want to compare the entire StopPath objects. Instead, only use StopPath.basicEquals(). This difference is very important so using an automatically generated method here would not suffice.
        Overrides:
        equals in class TripPatternBase
